metadata.name: Pointe Clean
metadata.description:
You can never underestimate the core strength of a ballerina. This shot was taken some time ago.

After watching several ballet performances, I was fascinated by their flexibility, elegance, and movement. People underestimate the ability ballet dancers possess, this concept represents how strong dancers are. 

Connie Vowles works with the Dutch National Ballet, formerly with the English National Ballet. She shows what ballet dancers are capable of, performing a “Squat Clean” but re-named Pointe Clean.

Location: London  
Edition: 1/1  
Year: 2017  
Artist: Vik Taak  
Dimensions 3911 x 5690

License: Can be used to display privately, in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The license includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works.
